content: I have prayed for this for so long, it's hard to believe Roe was finally overturned. This should spur on our efforts to support and care for women and families tempted to see abortion as their best or only option, to point them to the truth.

content.html: The #1 contributor to @kubernetesio and a former friend and coworker. Jordan, I hope your family never has to make the kind of life or death decision that this ruling just created for millions of good people. The place from which your prayers come is awash in white privilege.
